Method Detail

getUpdateRegionBegin

public static String getUpdateRegionBegin(javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext,
                                          String tag,
                                          String id,
                                          String globalId)
Returns an HTML code for marking the beginning of an update region. The crucial part of an update region is the ID of the element for which a content must be updated.

Parameters:
pageContext - The page context is used for resolving the current widget ID and its environment.
tag - The tag will be the rendered element tag.
id - The update region ID. The region is not global and is updated on certain pages.
globalId - The update region ID. The region is global and usually on every page.
Returns:
The HTML code as the beginning of the update region start.

getUpdateRegionEnd

public static String getUpdateRegionEnd(javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext,
                                        String tag,
                                        String id,
                                        String globalId)
Returns an HTML code for marking the end of an update region. The crucial part of an update region is the ID of the element for which a content must be updated.

Parameters:
pageContext - The page context is used for resolving the current widget ID and its environment.
tag - The tag will be the rendered element tag.
id - The update region ID. The region is not global and is updated on certain pages.
globalId - The update region ID. The region is global and usually on every page.
Returns:
The HTML code as the beginning of the update region start.
